name: Christmas
fax: I love to bake. I love to garden. I sing to Loyal every morning and night. When I decide to do something, I get obsessed and am unstoppable. I enjoy being underestimated because I know I will do what it takes to prove you wrong.
why: I want to show how strong of a plaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaayer I am. I want to WIN THE $500K this time!

name: David
fax: I enjoy functional fitness, photography, hiking, and traveling.
why:
I think we can all learn something from failure.
I'm looking forward to competing in Big Brother and just playing this very interesting social game

name: Nicole A.
fax: Podcasting: doing shows and conducting interviews (especially of fellow reality television stars) with my friend/co-host Eric and going on adventures
why: I want the prize money to really change my sisters' and my lives (i.e., move-out of my parents' house, get a car, get my own studio equipment for Eric and my podcast and shows, and start my life as an independent individual).

name: Dani
fax: I love doing anything with my daughter, working out, cooking, spending time with my husband and watching Real Housewives.
why: I want to bring back the old-school Big Brother gameplay... also want to finally get my W!

name: Cody
fax: My favorite activities include golfing, soccer, and video games.
why: I want to play Big Brother again because of money, money, money, and monayyyyyyy.

name: Kevin
fax: I'm a roller KWEEN who loves to SKATE (not bladeâ€¦EW) under the San Diego sun. I also love to work on my creative side hustles: button making, creating wall art, and taking on overly ambitious knitting projects.
why: I want to prove to myself and America that I'm an underrated player who deserves to reclaim his lost crown.

name: Tyler
fax: Traveling, beachin' it, exercise, and hanging out with my girlfriend, Angela.
why: To help Angela open her plant-based restaurant.

name: Bayleigh
fax: My favorite activities include yoga, playing with my dog (Velvet), and dates with my husband (Swaggy).
why: The first time I played Big Brother, I was distracted by a showmance and a pregnancy. Now, I have no distractions and I'm ready to play.

name: Nicole F.
fax: Eating!! Playing board games, spending time with my loved ones, and to be honest, 90 percent of my time and income goes to helping animals.
why: I love the game, I love everything about it. The fangirl in me could never turn it down. I'm also here to become the first EVER two-time winner, no big deal.

name: Memphis
fax: Cruising up the coast with my son, fishing, going to the beach, golfing, and traveling..

name: Enzo
fax: I like bike riding with my kids, fishing, working out, and rapping with friends!
why: I want to play to seal my legacy, not only as being part of one of the best alliances, but now one of the greatest to ever play!

name: Janelle
fax: Working out with my girlfriends at Pure Barre, drinking wine, spending time with my family, and interior decorating.
why: It is the greatest and most challenging game that I have ever played. I have a lot I have to prove myself.

name: Kaysar
fax: Spending time with the people I care about, using technology, product, and design to solve everyday problems.
why: I'm obsessed with being better than I once was.

name: Davonne
fax: I love doing things with my daughter. She's literally my best friend, the coolest human in the world, and she's hilarious too.
why: I genuinely LOVE this game. It's hard as hell and it will drive you crazy, but it's so much fun to play.

name: Keesha
why: I want to play because Big Brother is a great experience.

name: Ian
fax: I enjoy backgammon, running, technical analysis, reading, math puzzles,  and studying maps.
why: I'm a generally good games player, so if there's a game being played for money where I have positive equity, I want in!
